alert.note: Alert for Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Schoharie County through 530 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cobleskill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cobleskill, Middleburgh, Schoharie, Richmondville, Central Bridge, Old Central Bridge, Lawyersville, Huntersland, Warnerville, Old Stone Fort, Vintonton, Mineral Springs, Shutts Corners, Barnerville, Howes Cave, Sagendorf Corners, Beards Hollow, Watsonville, Greenbush and Vroman Corners. This includes Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
